title: (x) Helvetica infant - various suggestions {Florian, Jan}
content:
Does anybody know where i might be able to find the font Helvetica infant? A piece of work designed for young learners was passed on to me and i'm keen to keep the same style sheet, so if anybody could point me in the right direction it would be much appreciated.

Thanks
author: mawood

comments.content:
Hi Mark,  
welcome to Typophile!  
 [FF Schulbuch Nord](http://web.archive.org/web/20150126052944/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/fontfont/ff_schulbuch/) is essentially a ‘Helvetica Infant’. So is [AG Schoolbook 2](http://web.archive.org/web/20150126052944/http:/www.identifont.com/show?HG6). Monotype offers a bold version (only) that features a number of different letterforms (y, I) under the name of [Special Alphabets 10](http://web.archive.org/web/20150126052944/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/creative_alliance/special_alphabets_10/).  
F
